text: Ken Pontac (born May 22, 1957) is an American writer and voice actor, who was written for several shows like ToddWorld, LazyTown, and the adult animated web series Happy Tree Friends, for which he also provided additional voices and helped create its spin-off Ka-Pow!. Pontac also co-created the TV show Bump In The Night. Category:American television writers Category:American voice actors Category:1957 births Category:Living people
title: Ken Pontac
